__comment: The beginning of Journey to The Far Lands! I'm going to start naming this 'jevent_3' instead of 'event_18' because that was getting confusing. September 19th, 2021.

description.text: Journey to The Far Lands IV - October 2nd, 2021
As your crew makes landfall on The Lost Coast, a strange monument sits before you... Are the rumors true? Can this place truly catapult you into The Far Lands?
